Package jam.io

Contains classes for storing histograms and/or gates and scalers to files.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataIO Interface to read in and write out Jam data package
 

Class Summary
BatchExport Dialog for exporting lists of histograms.
ExtensionFileFilter Copied from SimpleFileFilter pages 363-364 in O'Reilly's Java Swing.
HistogramIO Class to read in and write out histograms writes out files in jam histogram format Methods to open files an close files are used by import and export.
ImpExp Abstract class for importing and exporting histograms.
ImpExpASCII Imports and exports histograms in ASCII channel-space-counts-return format.
ImpExpORNL Imports and exports Oak Ridge (Milner) formatted files, as used by DAMM and SORT.
ImpExpSPE Imports and Exports Spectra (Histograms) using the SPE format, this is used by RADWARE gf2.
ImpExpXSYS Imports and Exports Histograms files using the XSYS format.
 

Exception Summary
ImpExpException Exception that can be thrown by classes that import and export files.
 

Package jam.io Description

Contains classes for storing histograms and/or gates and scalers to files.
